summary: REQ-17 appears implemented by removing the Caffeine attribution from the footer. REQ-16 is only partially evidenced: SelectItem sentinel values like "all" are present, but the ShopPage Select components still use an empty-string Select `value` when state is null, which may not satisfy the requirement to show placeholder/cleared state without empty values.

missing_requirements.requirement: Each Shop filter must support an 'all/default' selection that clears the corresponding filter state to null and shows the placeholder text (cleared state).
missing_requirements.reason: In the diff, the Select components are controlled with `value={... || ''}`. Using an empty string as the Select value when the state is null can prevent the placeholder state from showing correctly (many Select implementations require `undefined` to show placeholder), and it reintroduces an empty-string value path even though SelectItem values are non-empty.

missing_requirements.requirement: All filter dropdowns on ShopPage (Category, Gold Type, Stone Type, Sort By) have no SelectItem with value="".
missing_requirements.reason: Only the Category dropdown is visible in the truncated diff; the Gold Type / Stone Type / Sort By SelectItem lists are not fully shown, so it cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary that none of them include `value=""`.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx (truncated after Gold Type section begins)
